ratings.comment: Finn was my teacher for Dutch 2. He was an expert in German, but not Dutch. He often had to look up answers to questions, or told us what the German answer would be, which was confusing. He was friendly with students, but also made multiple passive aggressive comments. At the last class he pulled up this site and waited for us to leave reviews.

Finn is a great TA and his teaching style focuses on the students and their needs. He is relaxed with grading and focuses more on the learning rather than perfection, which was great for me as sometimes language classes can be intimidating. Overall he made me very comfortable to learn German!
Finn is an amazing professor! Kind and caring. Extends deadlines if the reason is genuine.
Very nice and accommodating as long as you communicate. funny and chill too
Very organized, great engagement in the class. Greatly enjoyed the class
I think he was really good instructor who can balance rigor with fun. Of course, plan on it being time-consuming, as a language course.
I loved this course, and the instructor was a huge part of it. I definitely feel like I learned a lot, and the instructor simplifies daunting material.
Easy to come to class and learn

I took German 203. I found the coursework to be very manageable. Assignments are due on Wednesday and Friday and they take about an hour and a half to complete. Overall instruction is helpful and the content is relatively easy.

Mr. Shepherd was a great teacher for German 203 and his grading was very fair although some of the assignments were difficult. The quality of my German improved exponentially over the course of the semester.
Very kind and personable teacher. Expectations on assignments are very clear and he is very helpful in answering any questions.
Great German 101 class. Very easy to learn about the language. Sehr gut Lehrer

Herr Finn is probably the most engaging and interesting TA I have ever had. Class was five times a week but I hardly ever tired during it. Fun TA very nice grader would highly recommend him for German 101. Accidentally ghosted him on office hours once he's super accommodating and helpful. I definitely took away a lot from this course.

He is a really nice and fun guy that makes you actually want to come to class. He does a great job at making sure that everyone understands the concepts. Really great instructor and really great person :)
Finn is an amazing person. He cares for all his students and will adjust to schedule if needed. I honestly hope I see Finn again or even have him as a teacher.
